name: Dino Egg (itch)
description:
This is our entry for our school's 48-hour gamejam. It's a game about dinosaurs. If you don't know what a dinosaur is, get out of this house.

How to play

You are dinosaur. You have to balance the eggs on your back and reach the end of the level. There are 3 levels in this version.

Credits
  • Audio - Nixon
  • Programming - Riker & Eve
  • Art - Joshua & Dallast
  • Design - Eve & Riker

Created with the Unity Engine.
